original_title: Animecha Kejtsïtacua: Ofrenda para las ánimas
overview: Documentary about the ritual of the wake of souls, the nights of 1 and 2 November, in Urich, Puácuaro, Tziróndaro, Santa Fe de la Laguna, Ihuatzio Janitzio, localities on the banks of Lake Patzcuaro, whose authors examine the roots cultural and religious festival behind the Day of the Dead.
title: Animecha Kejtsïtacua: Ofrenda para las ánimas
